meanings.definition: Rearranged letters to form a new word or phrase.
meanings.sent2: She enjoys solving anagrams in the newspaper every morning.
meanings.sent3: The anagrammed of 'astronomer' is 'moon starer' - how funny!
meanings.sent4: In the world of puzzles, anagrammed words are like hidden treasures waiting to be discovered.
meanings.sent5: Her talent for anagrammed words made her the champion of the game night.

meanings.definition: The act of rearranging letters to form a new word or phrase.
meanings.sent2: He was caught in the act of anagrammed by his teacher during class.
meanings.sent3: The anagrammed of 'astronomer' is 'moon starer' - how amusing!
meanings.sent4: The anagrammed of letters on the fridge spelled out a secret message.
meanings.sent5: The anagrammed of words in the book revealed a hidden code.
